text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
In a remote region of the continent of<n>Umanest looms the
castle of the<n>demon lord.

text_block_list.name: Uma Lord Golshi
text_block_list.text:
Man, that was tasty! Nothing beats<n>ruining an entire
civilization for a bowl<n>of risotto!

text_block_list.name: Uma Lord Golshi
text_block_list.text:
Anyways... what am I going to do<n>about El and Grass? I
would've been<n>unstoppable if they hadn't showed<n>up.

text_block_list.name: Uma Lord Golshi
text_block_list.text:
I better get prepared before they<n>barge their way into my
castle. Hey,<n>Demon General A! Demon General B!

text_block_list.name: Demon Generals
text_block_list.text: How can we serve you, your demonic<n>lordship?

text_block_list.name: Uma Lord Golshi
text_block_list.text: It's Gold Ship, got it? The UmaLord Gold Ship!

text_block_list.name: Uma Lord Golshi
text_block_list.text:
Now listen up—go and give that<n>brawler El and her cleric
Grass a good<n>spanking and send 'em packing!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
I see. The "lordship" that demon<n>officer revered so much... is
actually<n>Gold Ship! If she's the cause of this<n>recent
trouble, we'll need to take her<n>out as soon as possible.
Ohohoho! I'm not about to let thathappen!

text_block_list.name: Madam King
text_block_list.text:
You're going to meet your end right<n>here, right now. As the
Uma Lord's<n>first-rate general, I, Madam King, will<n>make
sure of it!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Madam... King? A demon modeled<n>after King Halo, I gather.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
An evil King... let's just ignore her.<n>She'll probably fall to
ruin all on her<n>own.

text_block_list.name: Madam King
text_block_list.text: How rude! I will not fall to ruin inany way!

text_block_list.name: Madam King
text_block_list.text:
I should warn you though, I'm not the<n>only general here to
thwart your little<n>plans. Take a look up at the sky.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Gasp! Where did those darkclouds come from all of a sudden?

text_block_list.name: Madam King
text_block_list.text:
Ohohoho! Some demons are able to<n>manipulate the weather
to their liking.<n>It just so happens that my fellow<n>general is
one such demon!

text_block_list.name: Bloody Sky
text_block_list.text:
Hehehe. I'm the dark druid, Bloody<n>Sky. The peaceful Sky
you love is<n>about to disappear forever!

text_block_list.name: Bloody Sky
text_block_list.text: Come, crimson clouds! Bathe this<n>world in red!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Th-the sky's startin' to look all dark<n>and gloomy! Oh no...

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Be careful, El! We don't know what<n>kind of magic they'll
cast next!

text_block_list.name: Bloody Sky
text_block_list.text: Hehehehehe!

text_block_list.name: Bloody Sky
text_block_list.text:
I mean, changing the sky's color is<n>pretty much the extent
of my abilities.

text_block_list.name: Bloody Sky
text_block_list.text:
But still, it really set the mood, huh?<n>You can take it from
here, King!

text_block_list.name: Madam King
text_block_list.text:
Huh? Passing the buck before the<n>deed is done again? Why
are you<n>always... Oh... Ahem... Where were<n>we?

text_block_list.name: Madam King
text_block_list.text:
Now then, El. Allow me to welcome<n>you to my wonderful
realm of illusion<n>and magic. Welcome to The King's<n>World!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Huh? Where am I?

text_block_list.name: Madam King
text_block_list.text:
As you can surely see, this is the<n>ballroom of my lordship's
royal<n>palace. In this arena, we ladies will<n>compete not by
combat, but through<n>dance.

text_block_list.name: Madam King
text_block_list.text:
So, would you care to dance, El?<n>Surely, you know a friendly
social<n>dance or two?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: A, a what?! I-I mean, I know adance, sure...

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Check this out! Mambo!<n>A-cha-cha-cha! Cha-cha-cha-cha!<n>
Woo!

text_block_list.name: Madam King
text_block_list.text:
What? Your moves are terrible. It's<n>like watching a snow
monkey try to<n>dance. You have the nerve to<n>constantly
boast about being the<n>world's strongest, but by the looks of<n>
it...

text_block_list.name: Madam King
text_block_list.text: You're the world's weakestdancer!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Gahhhh! The world's... weakest?!

text_block_list.name: Madam King
text_block_list.text:
Yes. You are the world's absolute<n>weakest. Weakest,
weakest,<n>weakest...

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
The weakest, the weakest... I give<n>up... I can't bounce back
from this...

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Pull yourself together, El! Don't let<n>those illusions sway
you!

text_block_list.name: Madam King
text_block_list.text:
Ohohoho! With El down, we now only<n>have the cleric to deal
with. You won't<n>stand a chance against us.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Yes... You have a point. Unlike El, I<n>can't fight with my fists.
All I can do<n>is...

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Brighten up this cloudy sky.

text_block_list.name: Madam King
text_block_list.text:
Huh?! Where did that surge in<n>magical power come from?
Grass,<n>what are you up to?!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
If magic shrouds the world in<n>darkness, then as a cleric, it is
my<n>duty to clear that darkness away—by<n>the thunderous
light of the heavens.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
El wasn't the only one growing<n>stronger as we fought
battle after<n>battle to get here!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Divine judgment, come down and<n>cleanse this world!
Ninth-level cleric<n>spell—Angelic Bolt!

text_block_list.name: Madam King
text_block_list.text:
Huhhh?! The bloodstained clouds and<n>my ballroom both
vanished in a blink<n>of an eye!

text_block_list.name: Madam King
text_block_list.text: Retreat, Sky! We have to retreat!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Grass... That was amazin'! You finally<n>mastered Angelic
Bolt!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
With that spell under your belt,<n>defeatin' the Uma Lord will
be a piece<n>of cake!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
"Fantasy incarnate... shall look down<n>upon this world from
the heavens.<n>With innate, thunderous power..."

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Qué? Somethin' the matter?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
No, it's nothing. Now then, shall we be<n>off? We've got a
castle to storm!
